thread.title: BREAKING: Milo “Resigns” from Breitbart, but It’s What He Said Next That Has Everyone Talking…
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Milo “Resigns” from Breitbart, but It’s What He Said Next That Has Everyone Talking…

author: EdJenner
title: BREAKING: Milo “Resigns” from Breitbart, but It’s What He Said Next That Has Everyone Talking…
text:
Go to Article 
Breitbart Tech editor, Milo Yiannopolous has resigned from Breitbart after controversy about his comments concerning pedophilia. From Mediaite: In a statement published minutes ago, Yiannopoulos said, “Breitbart News has stood by me when others caved,” continuing, “I would be wrong to allow my poor choice of words to detract from my colleagues’ important reporting, so […]
